import React, { Fragment, useState} from 'react' const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email:'', password:'', }); const {email, password} = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Sucesss') } return
